title: Iran's President Calls Nuclear Deal An Important Step To Better Ties
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish speaks with Thomas Erdbrink of The New York Times about Iranian reactions to the nuclear framework reached this week.
contentencoded:
NPR's Audie Cornish speaks with Thomas Erdbrink of The New York Times about Iranian reactions to the nuclear framework reached this week. President Hassan Rouhani called the deal an important step towards engaging with the world.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
